columns.author_id: The unique identifier for each author or tutor.
columns.author_tutor_ATB: The attribute indicating the role of the author.
columns.login_name: The username used for author or tutor login.
columns.password: The encrypted password for secure user authentication.
columns.personal_name: The first name of the author or tutor.
columns.middle_name: The middle name of the author or tutor.
columns.family_name: The last name of the author or tutor.
columns.gender_mf: The gender of the author or tutor, represented by a single character.
columns.address_line_1: The primary address of the author or tutor.

Course_Authors_and_Tutors.table_description: The table holds information about course authors and tutors.

columns.student_id: The unique identifier for each student.
columns.date_of_registration: The date and time when the student registered.
columns.date_of_latest_logon: The date and time of the student's most recent logon.
columns.login_name: The username chosen by the student for login.
columns.password: The encrypted password for securing student login.
columns.personal_name: The first name of the student.
columns.middle_name: The middle name of the student.
columns.family_name: The last name of the student.

Students.table_description: The table stores information about students enrolled in courses.

columns.subject_id: The unique identifier for each subject.
columns.subject_name: The name of the subject offered in the curriculum.

Subjects.table_description: The table maintains information about subjects in the e-learning platform.

columns.course_id: The unique identifier for each course.
columns.author_id: The unique identifier for the course author.
columns.subject_id: The unique identifier for the subject of the course.
columns.course_name: The title of the course being offered.
columns.course_description: The detailed description of the course content.

Courses.table_description: The table contains details of courses available in the e-learning platform.

columns.registration_id: The unique identifier for each student course enrollment.
columns.student_id: The unique identifier for the student enrolling in the course.
columns.course_id: The unique identifier for the course being enrolled in.
columns.date_of_enrolment: The date and time when the student enrolled in the course.
columns.date_of_completion: The date and time when the course was completed by the student.

Student_Course_Enrolment.table_description: The table tracks student enrollments and course completion dates.

columns.registration_id: The unique identifier for each student's test registration.
columns.date_test_taken: The date and time when the test was taken by the student.
columns.test_result: The outcome of the test, indicating pass or fail.

Student_Tests_Taken.table_description: The table records details of tests taken by students and their results.
